about_the_game:
Dive into the enchanting world of "Hidden Cats - Pirates" a hidden object game where your mission is to uncover every cat hidden within stunning hand-painted artwork. Let your keen eye and curiosity guide you through this captivating journey.

※ Key Features:


😺 100 Hidden Cats: Discover 100 hidden cats scattered throughout the artwork.
💡 Unlimited Hints: Stuck? Use unlimited hints to find the hidden cats and keep progressing.
🎵 Custom Music: Enjoy unique background music for the artwork, enhancing your immersion.
🕒 Timer: Keep track of how long you take to complete the level with an in-game timer.
🏅 Leaderboard: Track your best times and challenge yourself to beat them.

※ Controls:


  • Navigate the scenes using your mouse to drag and move, and zoom in/out with your mouse wheel. Click on any cat you find to collect it.

※ Accessibility Features:


  • Night Mode for comfortable viewing

Join us in "Hidden Cats - Pirates" and indulge in the perfect blend of challenge, charm, and discovery. Will you find all the hidden cats? Let the hunt begin!
